Name: Diamond
Description: Embedding gems into gear can endow the gear with the unique effects contained in the gems.
Description2$english: Finished gem obtained through basic Gemcrafting processing of raw crystal materials. Combines aesthetic appeal with practical utility.

recipes.Name: Diamond
recipes.Des: Used for gear embedding, grants gear a slight luck attribute.

NeedMaterial.Name: Starlight  Diamond Lv.1
NeedMaterial.Description: Through Gemcrafting, raw ore can be processed into diamond.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A rare raw stone grown in Regnus, bringing an indescribable sense of opportunity.
